body.name: AKARSOLY Retro Game Console, Mini Classic Game System with 2 Classic Wireless Controllers and Built-in 620 Games, HDMI and AV Output Plug & Play Childhood Mini Classic Console, Birthday Gifts.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 10 hrs 12 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 22 hrs 27 mins
features: 620 Built-in Retro Games: Wireless retro game Console bring you back to 1980s-1990s which collects 620 different classic games, including dozens of the most classic classic video games, action, sports, puzzle solving, fighting and racing, etc. Back to happy childhood instantly.

Wireless Controllers,Support 2 Players Play: This wireless retro handheld game console with built in games comes with 2 PCS 2.4GHz wireless game controllers, wireless connection between game controller and game stick, no road restrictions, more fun.

AV and HDMI Output Display: video game console comes with an AV to HDMI converter (HDMI converter supports 720p /1080p), according to the selection of the input port, you can have more display options. You only use the TV remote control to select the AV or HDMI signal channel, Just connect the game console to both the TV and the power supply, and then the TV can displaythe vidoe games you want, Plug and play.

Important Notice: This is a third-party product and the game console cannot save progress.Some of the games here are in Japanese in this mini console.This is an 8-bit game console with simple controls and picture quality will not be as crisp as today's games,and frozen sometimes,But many classic games are still fun and very challenging.

Our Guarantee: We provide 30 days no reason to replace a faulty product or refund. If you have any question about our product, please feel free to contact us and let us know about the issue and we will reply in 24 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: THE BEST GAMES OF THE 1980S AND 1990S ARE BUILT IN THE AKARSOLY RETRO GAME CONSOLE WITH WIRELESS CONTROLLER This is a third-party game console. For those who are new to the super classic game consoles: this is an 8-bit retro game console with simple controls and the picture quality is not as crisp as today's games. You may not get used to the game system at first, but many classic games are still challenging.It provides 2 wireless controllers so that you can play games more conveniently. (Note that the controller connected first to the console is the primary controller and only the primary controller can control the console. The controller connected secondly to the console is the secondary controller, which functions only after you selected the 2 players' mode and when it's the 2nd player's turn to play the game.)

AN AV CABLE IS INCLUDED, AND HDMI NOT. Connect the video game console to the AV port of the TV, connect the power cord to the nes console, and then adjust the TV signal source to the AV channel to display TV games list screen on the TV. It is old fashioned video games for your television.Put 4 AAA NEW fully charged batteries into 2 game controllers, and use controller to control the kids video game consola videojuegos for the first time.The battery is not included in the package, you need to prepare it yourself. Each controller needs 2 AAA batteries.Quit the plug and play video games: Press SECECT + START at the same time for two seconds.

620 CLASSIC 80S AND 90S GAMES BUILT IN VIDEO GAME CONSOLE The classic games types included: action games, shooting games, sports games, fighting games, racing games, puzzle games.it some games are in Japanese, and some games repeat. Do not save progress.Easy to Use: Plug and play. No installation is required.
Easy to Use, Plug and Play If you are looking for something fashionable and high-tech, don't choose it

Easy to carry, Easy to use This super mini retro game console adopts a compact design. It is easy to carry and easy to use. You can put it into your pocket and carry it to your old friends' place and enjoy the games of your childhood together and relive childhood memories together. Promote Communication Can't find a topic to communicate with your child? The mini game console allows your children to experience the growing experience and happiness, and enhance communication and emotions with the children. Amazing Gift Share your childhood with your friends or kids, having the super retro consoles as a great holiday or birthday gift.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to use with a hdmi tv that is wall mounted… value for money.

reviews.reviewText: We love this game!! Brings back memories

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Does not come with HDMI CABLE! Only input yellow red and white!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Don’t expect it to be clear. Just like the old times. Has many games. Be ready to have yellow, red, white input on your TV because that’s the best to play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very clear picture on tv. Wireless controller is the best
reviews.reviewText: Only thing I dislike about is that I had to keep controller front of NES box clear of way otherwise if someone walks in front of you, it'll disconnected controller until this person gets out of way. But other than that Best game system for old school. Very satisfied

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Difficult to navigate
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to set up, but difficult to navigate through the games

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Nice little gaming device. It brings back good memories of the past
